data.text:
Infineum India recently transformed the learning experience for 1,000 students by upgrading science laboratories in two government high schools. Students can now conduct their own experiments, fostering a deeper connection to science beyond classroom lectures. S K Raghuram and Mohnish Shukla spearheaded this initiative, driven by Infineum’s commitment to deliver a positive impact in the communities that we operate. The project not only meets legal corporate social responsibility requirements but also reflects a genuine desire to make a difference to communities in need. Read more here: https://lnkd.in/dx6uQENV #EducationMatters #CommunityImpact #STEM #inspiringthenextgeneration #Sustainability

Infineum made our debut at this year’s Pride in London parade. Our team of 25 colleagues, friends and family joined over 32,000 participants, showcasing our commitment to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) and support for the LGBTQ+ community. The Pride in London parade is a vibrant event that brings together over 32,000 participants, including 500 groups representing various LGBTQ+ Community Groups, businesses, and partners. Our team was part of this colourful procession, led by the Mayor of London, that weaved its way from Hyde Park Corner, through iconic landmarks like Piccadilly Circus and Trafalgar Square, and culminated at Whitehall Place. Our participation in the Pride in London parade is a testament to our dedication to fostering an inclusive workplace where everyone feels accepted and valued. By standing shoulder-to-shoulder with the LGBTQ+ community, we not only celebrate their resilience, courage, and contributions but also reaffirm our commitment to championing diversity, equity, and inclusion within our organisation and beyond. #PrideInLondon #InfineumPride #Diversity #Equity #Inclusion #WeAreEverywhere

We’re thrilled to announce the publication of our 2023 Sustainability Report! Aligned with our strategic vision to become a sustainable world-class specialty chemicals company, this report highlights our commitment to a sustainable future. Watch the Highlights: Our video summary captures the essence of our achievements over the past year. But that’s not all! Here’s what else we’re excited to share: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion (DE&I): We’ve championed DE&I throughout our organisation. By fostering an inclusive environment, we empower our colleagues to thrive and contribute their unique perspectives. Volunteering Success: Our colleagues’ dedication knows no bounds! We’ve achieved an impressive 28% participation rate in volunteering activities, surpassing our 2025 target of 25%. Together, we’re making a positive impact in our communities. Ready to dive into the full report? Head over to our revamped website: https://lnkd.in/dk3AjYn5 Stay tuned for more exciting updates as we continue our sustainability journey!

The steady growth of our e-fluids business is a testament to our sustainability progress as well as our dedication to pushing the boundaries of technology. Hear from Camille Herry, Infineum’s Strategic Marketing Manager, as she shares insights into our industry-leading e-fluids technology and our commitment to building a strong team to continue formulating cutting-edge e-fluids solutions. From our roots in e-fluids to our expansion into new business areas, we are setting the pace for a greener, more innovative tomorrow. #OneInfineum #EFluids #Innovation #Sustainability #Teamwork

Today we are celebrating our fantastic multicultural community as part of World Day for Cultural Diversity for Dialogue and Development, a global event held every year by UNESCO on 21 May. At Infineum we believe that our strength lies in our differences where each colleague brings their unique perspective and ideas, nurturing an environment of growth and innovation. We are marking this day to highlight the work Infineum is doing to improve its Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI), which is an integral part of our sustainability strategy. Hear from our colleagues of diverse cultural backgrounds as they share their thoughts about working at Infineum from a cultural diversity perspective. Let's celebrate diversity and continue to foster an inclusive environment where everyone's voice is heard and valued. #CulturalDiversity #DEI #Sustainability #OneInfineum #WorldDayForCulturalDiversity

We have announced our ambition to reach net zero for scope 1 & 2 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by 2050 from our operated assets and reduce our scope 3 emissions by about 20% by 2030. This strong ambition supports our vision of being a sustainable, world-class specialty chemicals company.

We have proudly joined the Earth Trust corporate members community, marking the beginning of a new partnership to increase community engagement and employee volunteering in the local area surrounding our UK Headquarters in Oxfordshire. The collaboration with Earth Trust will also provide invaluable insights into how we can adapt our operations to protect and restore nature, aligning with our sustainability ambitions. The Earth Trust charity cares for 500 hectares of diverse landscapes, including woodland, farmland, wildflower meadows, and wetlands. These green spaces are open to the public so that everyone can connect with nature and explore how nature-based solutions can address climate, biodiversity, and health challenges. Earth Trust’s impactful work includes: Community Access: Supporting disadvantaged communities in accessing green spaces. Nature Education: Engaging children with the natural world around them. Wetland Restoration: Reintroducing wetlands along the Thames, contributing to evidence-based climate solutions. We’re thrilled to embark on this journey with Earth Trust, and we look forward to making a positive difference together! #Sustainability #SupportingOurCommunities #CommunityEngagement Photo credit: Earth Trust
